text: Potter Run is a tributary to Neshannock Creek in western Pennsylvania. The stream rises in south-central Lawrence County and flows west and enters Neshannock Creek just downstream of Volant, Pennsylvania. The watershed is roughly 50% agricultural, 44% forested and the rest is other uses. ==References== Category:Rivers of Pennsylvania Category:Tributaries of the Beaver River Category:Rivers of Lawrence County, Pennsylvania
title: Potter Run (Neshannock Creek tributary)
